column1: Table 6 8: Details of reservation improvement for Great Valley Wewa
1. Dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Madan /Aththikka/ Wal del/ Kekuna /Mango/ Guava/ randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid intervals for 300 m2.
2. Apply mulching, organic manure, and NPK fertilizer.
3. Introduction of Bamboo, Vetiver grass, and riparian plants. Covered area 100 m2.
4. Maintain for six months and continue watering for one year as required.
